description: React component for creating a new course in an instructor dashboard, including form handling, role assignment, prerequisites, and API interaction.

methods.name: NewCoursePage
methods.description: Main React component for the new course creation page, managing form state, permissions, and submission.

methods.name: toggleRole
methods.description: Toggle assignment of a role to the course.

methods.name: togglePrerequisite
methods.description: Toggle selection of a prerequisite course.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, creates course via API, updates store, and redirects.
